title: Is Kindle safe for the eyes? - Quora

response.answer_text: I hope so since I used one for awhile. The lighting is adjustable which is a big help. My Kindle got something spilled on it, which rendered it useless. As with any electronic device, it is good to briefly rest your eyes every so often either by looking off into the distance or simply closing your eyes for a moment.
Yup Absolutely because it doesn't produces hazardous blue light and equally to like a page colour and contrast. The contrast shouldn't be increased. Rest ok to read on it.
